mapper.select: SELECT CLASSNUM, INSTRUCTOR, PRIMARYCATEGORY, SECONDARYCATEGORY, TITLE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, LOCATION FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY CLASSNUM DESC) AS RNUM, CLASSNUM, INSTRUCTOR, PRIMARYCATEGORY, SECONDARYCATEGORY, TITLE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, LOCATION FROM ONEDAYCLASS WHERE 1=1 AND INSTRUCTOR LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' ORDER BY CLASSNUM DESC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM ONEDAYCLASS WHERE 1=1 AND INSTRUCTOR LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
